project: Pesaflip Web App (B2B SME Finance Platform)

rules.rule: All user authentication must be done via OTP sent to phone numbers
Business profiles must be created before accessing financial features
MPESA collections must be logged with transaction status and metadata
Invoices must be generated as PDFs and trackable via link
AI invoice suggestions must use past data scoped to the authenticated user
Receipts uploaded must be scanned with OCR and linked to expense records
Only one payment method may be active per transaction (MPESA or card)
User financial data must never be shared without explicit consent
All external API keys must be stored in environment variables
Credit scoring logic must be explainable and never auto-approve loans
